name: Andrew (Drewski) Nixdorf
role: Lead SDET • QA Automation • AI + AWS
summary: Problem-solver and master test crafter. Lead SDET at Zywave; Katalon Creator. I build resilient CI/CD pipelines, AI-powered testing workflows, and high-signal QA strategies that scale.

projects.title: Portal-RAG (AWS Bedrock + OpenSearch)
projects.description: Serverless RAG pipeline to index insurance portals and power QA/doc analysis for test design and triage.

projects.title: TestPilot QA Agent
projects.description: AI-assisted test generation & analysis, integrated with Katalon/Playwright and Jira ticketing.

projects.title: SmartSage (Disciplinet)
projects.description: Prototype AI/ML engineer agent for personalization, metrics, ethical checks, and model tuning.

experience.title: Lead SDET
experience.highlights: Built automation frameworks, load testing strategies, and AI-driven defect discovery across multiple products.

experience.title: Organizer
experience.highlights: Monthly community talks; led hackathon & sponsorship outreach.

experience.title: Founder
experience.highlights: AI habit-building app; created agents like SmartSage for personalization and model insights.

meta.title: Andrew Nixdorf — SDET • QA • AI
meta.description: Lead SDET (Zywave). QA automation, Katalon, AWS, Bedrock, RAG, and DevOps. Portfolio, projects, and resume.
